name: Brick Breaker with Risa
description:
Classic Brick Breaker remade. Break bricks, catch good power ups and avoid the dangerous ones. Play through 10 levels with multiple stages. Completing all stages will unlock next level. Try to beat your own score and when you still feel you need more, you can use in-game level editor to make your own levels.
Game supports game-pad in game and partially in menus.
"I'm looking forward to play with you"
